item.description: Hello every one trying to start the summer off with some fun and music, well I have just the place for you "Whippersnappers with Mama Kicks" will be rocking this place and if anyone wants to join in on the fun this is a nice place to do it. You can get there early and have dinner food is good, eat in the sports bar area or the restuarant what ever floats your little heart. I also heard they have eliminated the cover charge so what more can you ask for. If any one wants to get there early and grab us a table chime in feel free, I won't be able to get there for dinner but will be seeing you on the dance floor. Just bring a smile and your dancing feet and you will be all set. You can check this band out at  www.mamakicks.com .

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lets Whoop it up to "Mama Kicks" At Whippersnappers
